title: 2005 Dodge Sprinter Van 3500 (Not Running)
item_description:
2005 Dodge Sprinter Van 3500 (Not Running)

Removal Note: This lot can only be removed on Monday, November 25th, 2024, from 9:00 AM to 3:30 PM. Earlier or later times will not be permitted.

Specifications

  • Year: 2005
  • Make: Dodge Ram
  • Model: Sprinter
  • VIN: WD2PD444255720478
  • License: 8N16823
    • Registration Expiration: 3/31/2023
    • VEH REG SUSPENDED EFF: 06/17/2024
  • Odometer Reads: 222,601
  • Key: Available
  • Drive Type: Rear Wheel Drive
  • Engine: Inline 5 Turbo Diesel
  • Body Style: Van
  • Fuel Type: Diesel
  • Transmission: Automatic
  • Tire Size: LT225/75R16
  • Deck Length: 125”
  • Deck Width: 69”
  • Wall Height: 70”

Exterior

  • Exterior Color: White
  • Doors: Four Door

Interior

  • Interior Material: Cloth
  • Interior Color: Gray
  • Features:
    • CD Player
    • Cruise Control
    • Power Locks
    • Power Windows
    • Power Mirrors
    • Air Conditioning
    • Dual Rear Wheels
  • Contents not included

Note: Certificate of Title, Transfer Form, Death Certificate, and Transfer without Probate will be mailed 2-3 weeks after removal. The Seller is selling this vehicle "as-is" in need of repair, without smog, the buyer agrees to repair and smog the vehicle and sign an "as-is" bill of sale. The Bidder shall not bid on behalf of another individual; the Bidder/Purchaser/DMV Registrant must be the same. The Buyer is fully responsible for all aspects of repairs, smog, registration, inspections, transfer, taxes, and fees due to the DMV.
